page.title: 16DONCASTER'S GHOSTS
page.content: GHOSTS ARE THE SPIRITS OF DEAD PEOPLE WHICH CANNOT REST AND THEREFORE WANDER ABOUT.IN THE DONCASTER AREA WE FOUND EVIDENCE OF THREE GHOSTS: {THE SEVEN FOOT TALL GHOST}WAS SEEN IN THE WINTER OF 1916.IT LIT A CIGARETTE AND SLOWLY BLEW THE SMOKE FROM IT INTO THE NIGHT AIR.IT DISAPPEARED AFTER THE TRAIN AT 1.15 AM.AN EYE WITNESS SAID IT WAS WEARING A MONK'S COWL. {FRED}- IN D.C.EVANS' MODEL SHOP THERE IS A GHOST CALLED 'FRED'.THE SHOP OWNER HAS SEEN IT THREE TIMES,THE LAST TIME BEING ON 12TH JUNE,1985.ALL THE STAFF HAVE HEARD IT.FRED IS 4FT.5IN. TALL WITH THE FIGURE OF AN OLD MAN BUT THE FACE OF A YOUNG BOY. {THE 7.30 GHOST}IS SEEN AT THIS TIME IN GREENFIELD LANE.IT JUMPS OFF THE 7.30 TRAIN,SKIPS INTO A NEARBY FIELD AND DISAPPEARS.
